name: Aganar
description: print("a gentleman with an air of leadership about him.")

60: print("\"Good $T, Avatar. Is there ought else I can aid thee with?\"")
print("\"Thou art the Avatar! I saw thy portrait in Lord British's castle.\"")
print("\n\n\"If there be any assistance I can offer, thou needst but ask it.\"")
print("\"I keep things running smoothly here. 'Tis not difficult in a town of such @honesty.\"")
print("\"Verily, 'tis a fine town. Hast thou ever thought of moving here?\" ")
print("\"Thou wilt see much drinking at the Blue Bottle Tavern, and singing, and revelry, and telling of tales.\"\n*\n\"But mostly @drinking.\"")
print("\"If thou art curious, why not go pay a visit?\"\n*\n\"Thou cannot miss it - 'tis the biggest building in town.\"")
print("\"Honesty is the virtue we prize most highly here in Moonglow.\"")
print("\n\n\"We are closest to the @Shrine of Honesty, and indeed, the @Rune of Honesty was entrusted into my care some years ago.\"")
print("\"'Tis north of here, on Dagger Isle.\"")
print("\"Aye, just a ways to the north.\"")
print("\"I had it once, but I entrusted it to @Beyvin's care, as he is the most honest man I know.\"\n*\n\"He lives with @Penumbra.\"")
print("\"Penumbra might be able to help you with that.\"")
print("\"I can't imagine what Beyvin sees in her!\"")
print("\"Haven't seen him around lately. Penumbra should be able to tell you where to find him.\"")
1508: print("\"Thou wouldst not regret it.\"\n*\n\"There's good @fishing off our shores, and plenty of merriment to be found over at the Blue @Bottle.\"")
